metadata.dc:author: García Mérida, M
Argos Rodríguez, M D
López Pérez, G
Navarro, A
metadata.dc:description: Three cases of pheochromocytoma in children are presented. Diagnosis was made by selective adrenal arteriography, ultrasound examination and catecholamines urinary levels. The surgical treatment consisted in exeresis of the tumor in all cases. In one case familial incidence was found. The postoperative course has been normal in all cases.
metadata.dc:title: Feocromocitomas en la infancia.
[Pheochromocytomas in children].
